title: Error with nodejs and npm
body:
Was installing Phonegap in my notebook , which has 10 windows , and when I got to the part where needed to run the command " npm install -g phonegap " at the prompt , the following errors appear :

> Microsoft Windows version 10.0.10586 2015 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved

nodes.body: Closing as I could not repro this issue anymore. If this still happens to you, please file a new issue.
